Schmuugle
Download
Layouts Main Toolbar Edit Toolbar Menu Nav Sidebar list

Schmuugle provides styles for a basic frame-set with header, sidebar and content area. Besides it adds common navigation form elements.

Schmuugle is build on top of Bootstrap and Font-Awesome and tries to rely on their provided base elements.

Layouts

Basic List Layout template

Just the basic frames: compiled CSS and JavaScript along with a container.

List example

Shows a full blown list with list actions on top.

Edit Layout

Basic layout of an edit view, with edit toolbar.
